path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Burst Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_info.project_path: Experiments/contracts/Burst Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/BURST-Token

findings.title: Missing License
findings.description: Developers need to use a license according to your project. The suggestion to use here would be an SPDX license.

findings.title: Non-compliance with Open Zeppelin standard for token contract making
findings.description: The contract does not follow Open Zeppelin standard for token contract making, missing functions like ERC20Burnable, ERC20Pausable, ERC20Mintable, TokenTimelock, IERC20 and others.
